items.content_html: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: ghiscoding/vanilla-calendar-picker: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: payWave is a lightweight and efficient transaction management library designed to handle transactions and ensure rollback capabilities in case of errors. This repository provides tools to manage transactions seamlessly and maintain data integrity.

items.content_html: TinyPath is a lightweight and efficient URL shortener that transforms long web addresses into compact, easy-to-share links. With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.
items.title: ennypitan/TinyPath: TinyPath is a lightweight and efficient URL shortener that transforms long web addresses into compact, easy-to-share links. With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.
